lender.name: Nam
lender.loan_because:
With Kiva, I help entrepreneurs start a business, nourish their family, or pay for emergencies. All of this for no-to-low overhead cost.
If we don't help those in impoverished areas, then the alternative is for them to rely on outrageous loans that burden them from successfully starting their business.
For some background Information, here's a TED video: http://www.ted.com/talks/jessica_jackley_poverty_money_and_love.html

lender.occupational_info: I'm pursuing a PhD in computer science. That entails 5-6 years of research on a particular topic. In my case, I'm studying the application of artificial intelligence techniques to games. That may sound a little abstract or even downright callous, given the problems that the world faces, but I hope that the techniques that I'll be studying, including real-time planning techniques, can be applied to other domains fruitfully.

lender.name: firstcentralmortgagefund
lender.loan_because: First Central Mortgage Funding Inc has perfected the alternative approach to lending that allows the firm to stand out in the competitive mortgage and real estate financing industry. Based out of Toronto, Ontario, First Central Mortgage Funding Inc. funds projects other lending institutions chained to traditional financing industry standards usually let pass.
lender.occupational_info:
As an alternative financing source, First Central Mortgage Funding Inc. focuses on the human side of an investment, which allows it to make lending decisions other companies normally ignore.
The key to First Central Mortgage Funding’s alternative funding success is based on its unique lending process; it breaks down transactions into a simple screening procedure that takes into account the specific needs of each borrower. Larger financing companies exercise broad numeric assessments to make lending decisions, but First Central Mortgage Funding utilizes simplified, yet extremely case-specific, financing methods.
First Central Mortgage Funding analyzes its clients funding applications, issuing a commitment only after extensive due diligence is conducted. After an investment is approved, the borrower has the chance to review the commitment and decide if they want to accept the financing terms presented by First Central Mortgage Funding Inc. The simple financing system revolves around personalized interactions between First Central Mortgage Funding and its clients. First Central Mortgage Funding Inc. may not process lending solutions as quickly as other financing companies that absentmindedly pump out transactions, but careful pacing ensures that the individual needs of both parties are met and agreed upon, creating more personalized financing options.
First Central Mortgage Funding specializes in a wide variety of lending transactions, including home mortgages, short-term bridge financing, and multi-national retail development. Bridge Loans are short-term loans that are used for temporary financing while larger, long-term financing deals are made. This type of loan adds a degree of flexibility to lending transactions that help the borrower initiate their desired project. First Central Mortgage Funding’s ability to use bridge loans as temporary financing solutions is just one example of the company's numerous innovative financing solutions.
First Central Mortgage Funding does not entertain applications from the mortgager directly; our deals are funded only through licensed mortgage brokers. Please have your broker contact us on your behalf.
Visit us at http://www.firstcentralmortgagefunding.com

lender.name: Ralf
lender.loan_because: I like to help people directly with a small amount of money.

lender.name: Pattie Meyers
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to still be here and my passion is to help others in their journey. As a three time breast cancer and brain surgery survivor, I recognize that each day spent on this earth is a gift and I want to make a difference in the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info:
I am the founder of three, multifaceted businesses in the last few years all under the name of The PM Companies, which targets both Orange and Los Angeles County areas. They include Balanced Sole Reflexology (www.BalancedSoleReflexology.com), Pattie’s Pet Care and House Sitting (www.PattiesPetCareAndHouseSitting.com) and an online travel site, A1 Travel and Fun (www.A1TravelAndFun.com).
As a result of my health issues and experiences, I am especially passionate about health care and women’s issues. I strive to educate my clients of the importance of health, stressing relaxation, sleeping better, eating healthy, exercising and learning how to be in tuned to one’s body and what it is telling you.
Knowing that reflexology can make a difference in the well being of one’s life, some of the ways I give back is by being a volunteer in the community. I perform reflexology for women at an abuse shelter, chemotherapy patients and hospice patients allowing them to relax with reflexology and a tender touch. I also volunteer at the Compton Work Day project, Relay for Life events and am currently working on getting clearance to perform reflexology on firefighters during wild land fire fighting emergencies. In addition, I give educational talks at a variety of forums to help others learn the importance of taking care of oneself.
My love of animals has drawn me to care for pets while the owners are on vacation or business trips. My pet care and house sitting business allows owners to feel safe while out of town and enjoy their time away knowing that I'm taking care of their precious pets. I give them undivided attention and often go beyond the call of duty simply because I love animals and treat them as I would my own. Owners have expressed amazement when meeting me since their pets go to me without hesitation unlike other strangers. A true testament of my natural love of animals.
A1 Travel And Fun is an online - one stop center for all of your travel, entertainment or specialty needs. Most anything you can do on line is now available at one site. Whether that be travel, dinner, theater, racing, concerts, shopping, etc.
I have gone through personal health issues that would make some want to give up on life. My battle with cancer on three separate occasions made me stronger and has motivated me to share my life story with others in order to give them hope. My struggles after brain surgery changed my life course because it limited me in ways where I could no longer function as before, but I refuse to allow it to define me. Instead, I take these adversities and newfound skills into the community to help others lives each day hoping to make a difference. I want my actions to make a meaningful imprint on the future of my community and local businesses. My intent is to set a good example to others and inspire many by sharing my life story and my desire to make a difference.

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: it makes a difference!

lender.name: Irv
lender.loan_because: I can. I want to feel connected to those I help, and want to help those I empathise with. Kiva.org lets me do just that!
lender.occupational_info: I help design computer systems for a travel company as my main job. For relaxation and fulfillment I enjoy photography.

lender.name: Lara
lender.loan_because: I can, it's as simple as that.
lender.occupational_info: Finance and Internet - I work with a diverse group of companies and talented individuals promoting e-payment developments within Europe and worldwide.

lender.name: Debbie & Geoff
lender.loan_because: providing a means to improve oneself and family brings self respect along with a sense of personal, spriritual and community accomplishment.
lender.occupational_info: My husband Geoff and I are retired and are enjoying the daily freedom to help family and friends

lender.name: Fisher
lender.loan_because: I Have
lender.occupational_info:
I do internet marketing for a living and I love it. I think that the best way to help people is not to give them a fish but give them a rod.
Hope to make this world a little better and help others enjoy life cause that what it's all about.

lender.name: Petra
lender.loan_because: I want to help mainly women to help themselves and support their children.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I believe that every living being is connected, and we have an obligation to help one another in whatever way we can.

lender.name: Elke
lender.loan_because: I can afford little sums. But if many of us do so things will become great. And I like to further individual steps to master difficulties of life.

lender.name: PD3K
lender.loan_because: Those who can, do. Those who can't, donate. I'm just doing what I can to support others in their attempts to improve their lives.

lender.name: Janette
lender.loan_because: it's cool watching these people buy their business needs.

lender.name: Colin
lender.loan_because: Smiles are irreplaceable!
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses grow.

lender.name: nancy
lender.loan_because: i am blessed

lender.name: Anita
lender.loan_because: Loaning through Kiva is giving back the blessings that I have received.
lender.occupational_info: retired from software development; volunteer worker for community service and church groups

lender.name: COKE
lender.loan_because: We have a small group of us who believe this is a great way to invest some money...COKE has been good to us and so we try to support people who sell COKE so it can be good to them also..

lender.name: andres
lender.loan_because: Is great to have the opportunity to help someone you don't know succeed and get ahead in their life.

lender.name: sally
lender.loan_because: I like being able to make a difference even if it may only a little at a time.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowering entrepreneurs to reach their potential.
lender.occupational_info: I focus on children in emerging countries and the service organizations who assist them.

lender.name: Jacques & Suzanne
lender.loan_because: We think it will be a good thing to be able to help people with these small loans and have such an impact in improving their lives!
lender.occupational_info: Jacques is retired, on disability, and does some part time computer support work. Suzanne works for the local University.

lender.name: Brian&Tricia
lender.loan_because: We believe the world needs more small business owners, and that by working with them, we can help others gain independence.

lender.name: Curtis
lender.loan_because: We all need help from time to time.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: I can and others need.
lender.occupational_info: I design and implement computer systems (hardware and software)

lender.name: Ivan
lender.occupational_info: I am an IT engineer at one of the worlds leading telecommunications companies

lender.name: Happy
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with a wonderful family and a good education, and I want to help others to access the same opportunities I have had.
lender.occupational_info: I am a lawyer by day. I also teach an outdoor Yoga class at sunrise, and a portion of the class fee goes to KIVA.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of giving those in the developing world the tools to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time university student in the United States.

lender.name: Tanya
lender.loan_because: I want to create a world where we all have an opportunity to be the best we can be. Kiva offers our family a chance to share and reminds us we are part of a bigger world. It's an honour to be able to participate.
lender.occupational_info: I work in our community making it a happier, safer place to live.

lender.name: Parham
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Brendan Morrison
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate enough to follow my dreams and I want to do what I can to help others follow theirs.
lender.occupational_info: I make games for people to play.

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: I got a huge leg up with a small loan a few years ago, I hope this does the trick for someone else.
lender.occupational_info: Coal mine planning

lender.name: mc_fxtrader
lender.loan_because: I want to share the feeling of having success and being independent after coming from the shithouse..... This positive feeling is valid worldwide ;-)) Be warned : The fall back from penthouse to shithouse could be fast with a hard landing....
lender.occupational_info: Buying and selling of currencies "Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time" - Thomas A. Edison -

lender.name: Susu
lender.loan_because: I hope that a little sum can go a very long way.

lender.name: Olivier Gagneux
lender.loan_because: poverty is the root cause of many, if not most, of our problems.
lender.occupational_info: I am a percussionist/tres player in a funk band and several Cuban bands. I also develop software to analyze the side effects of drugs for a pharmaceutical company.

lender.name: Bram
lender.loan_because: It's a very direct way to support people on their way out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: Studying physics

lender.name: Karim
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others, especially those in need to the best of my abilities.
lender.occupational_info: I enjoy leading the team in charge of managing the field operation for the Cisco Entrepreneur Institute, an initiative to help fostering entrepreneurship around the globe. Working with local public and private sector organizations, to help communities and nations harness the power of entrepreneurship for economic and social prosperity.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: it makes me grateful for what I have.
lender.occupational_info: If someone's car breaks down, they call me, and I figure out, whether to send someone to fix it, or send the car away to get fixed

lender.name: Anonymous
lender.loan_because: I have friends in Togo

lender.name: steve keenan
lender.loan_because: I've travelled for 30 years. Time to put something back in

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I heard about Kiva on RTE Radio and thought it was a good idea.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a Cooperative housing society, providing homes for persons in need of a home.
